member.name: P:Amazon.SagemakerEdgeManager.Model.SendHeartbeatRequest.Models

member.name: T:Amazon.SagemakerEdgeManager.AmazonSagemakerEdgeManagerClient
member.summary:
Implementation for accessing SagemakerEdgeManager
SageMaker Edge Manager dataplane service for communicating with active agents.

member.name: M:Amazon.SagemakerEdgeManager.AmazonSagemakerEdgeManagerClient.#ctor
member.summary:
Constructs AmazonSagemakerEdgeManagerClient with the credentials loaded from the application's default configuration, and if unsuccessful from the Instance Profile service on an EC2 instance.
Example App.config with credentials set.
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <configuration> <appSettings> <add key="AWSProfileName" value="AWS Default"/> </appSettings> </configuration>

member.name: M:Amazon.SagemakerEdgeManager.AmazonSagemakerEdgeManagerClient.#ctor(Amazon.RegionEndpoint)
member.summary:
Constructs AmazonSagemakerEdgeManagerClient with the credentials loaded from the application's default configuration, and if unsuccessful from the Instance Profile service on an EC2 instance.
Example App.config with credentials set.
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <configuration> <appSettings> <add key="AWSProfileName" value="AWS Default"/> </appSettings> </configuration>
